Holy Trinity Community PICNIC Recognizing our YAL

About Us

About Us
Friends & Loved Ones in Our Church
Protopresbyter & Proistamenos
Our Church is One Big Family in Christ
We welcome all that visit our Holy Trinity Parish Family. Our Church offers the fullness of the Orthodox Faith with all the pearls of its rich tradition. We personally invite you to become an active and integral part of our Parish.
